messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Electrical Storm Alert

An electrical storm has been detected in your area, please repair potential electronic overloads.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Starboard Bow Solar Array.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Unknown Vessel near station. Also. Half of cargo has been blown up?..A reward is in order for whoever catches the person responsable for the mess.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: This shift was really fucking gay, im dissapointed in you all
